code: import React from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{logout}from'../../store/session';import{resetReservations}from'../../store/reservations';import{resetReviews}from'../../store/reviews';import'./LogoutButton.css';import{resetSavedRestaurants}from'../../store/savedRestaurants';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LogoutButton=_ref=>{let{setShowSignInModal}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const history=useHistory();const onLogout=async e=>{dispatch(resetReservations());dispatch(resetReviews());dispatch(resetSavedRestaurants());await dispatch(logout());history.push('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-drop-logout-button",onClick:onLogout,children:"Sign out"});};export default LogoutButton;
